base.name: SafetyKatz
author: Russel Van Tuyl (@Ne0nd0g)

options.name: .NetVersion
options.description: The .Net Framework version compiler to use (i.e. v3.0, v3.5, or v4.*)

options.name: FileName1
options.description: The downloaded filename, without the file extension, used for the resulting SafetyKatz source code and compiled files

options.name: FileName2
options.description: The downloaded filename, without the file extension, used for the resulting Constants source code file

base.description: SafetyKatz is a combination of slightly modified version of @gentilkiwi's Mimikatz project and @subTee's .NET PE Loader. This module downloads the project's C# source code files, compiles them with .Net's csc.exe, executes it, and then deletes the files.
base.notes:
-SafetyKatz was created by Will Schroeder (@harmj0y) and is part of the ðŸ‘» GhostPack tool set: https://github.com/GhostPack/SafetyKatz
	-First, the MiniDumpWriteDump Win32 API call is used to create a minidump of LSASS to C:\Windows\Temp\debug.bin. Then @subtee's PELoader is used to load a customized version of Mimikatz that runs sekurlsa::logonpasswords and sekurlsa::ekeys on the minidump file, removing the file after execution is complete.
